```{r}

# load libraries ----
library(GGally)
library(skimr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)

# Always look at it ----
#View(penguins)

# Check the column names ----
names(penguins) 

# Check the dimensions ----
dim(penguins) 

# get a summary of your df ----
summary(penguins)

# get a summary using {skimr} ----
skimr::skim(penguins)

# head and tail ----
head(penguins, n = 3)
tail(penguins)

#pairsplot ----
GGally::ggpairs(penguins, columns = 3:6, ggplot2::aes(color = species))
```
